trans-unit.source: Show these channels in the front end form.
trans-unit.target: Mussar quests chanals en il front-end.

trans-unit.source: Please select one or more channels.
Do not show the channel selection menu.
trans-unit.target: Betg mussar il menu per tscherner chanals.

trans-unit.source: You can use the wildcards ##channels## (channel names), ##domain## (domain name) and ##link## (activation link).
trans-unit.target: Ti pos utilisar ils tegnaplazza ##channels## (nun dal chanal), ##domain## (num da la domain) e ##link## (link per l'activaziun).

trans-unit.source: You can use the wildcards ##channels## (channel names) and ##domain## (domain name).
trans-unit.target: Ti pos utilisar ils tegnaplazza ##channels## (nun dal chanal) e ##domain## (num da la domain).

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the newsletter template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti tscherner il template per il newsletter.

trans-unit.source:
You have subscribed to the following channels on ##domain##:
##channels##
Please click ##link## to activate your subscription. If you did not subscribe yourself, please ignore this e-mail.
trans-unit.target:
Ti has abunà suandants chanals sin ##domain##:
##channels##
Cliccar sin ##link## per activar tes abunament. Sche ti n'has betg abunà quest newsletter pos ti ignorar quest messadi.

trans-unit.source:
You have unsubscribed from the following channels on ##domain##:
##channels##
trans-unit.target:
Ti has de-abunà suandants chanals sin ##domain##:
##channels##
